titleStmt.title: Register of Documents Prepared at the Grapheion
titleStmt.author: Kronion son of Apion

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: On Phaophi 7. Acknowledgment (of receipt) of a dowry of 200 silver drachmai, (made) by Tapsosneus to Nesterion. (Fee:) 10 obols.;Agreement to furnish lodging for the sum of 100 silver drachmai, (made) by Papontos and others to his(?) daughter Thenmaron the Little. (Fee:) 2 drachmai.;Payment of a rent of 124 drachmai, (made) by Hatres the fuller, of Kerkesis. (Fee:) 10 obols.;(Received) for the sale of a donkey, through Dandalos: 6 obols.;[[Agreement to furnish lodging, (made) by Papontos and another to Thenmaron]];On Phaophi 7. Agreement of sale of a donkey, (made) by Potamon to Apynchis. (Fee:) 7 obols.;Agreement of sale of a donkey, (made) by Harsisouchos to Diodoros. [- - -];Agreement of sale of a donkey, (made) by Areios to Serapas and another. [- - -];Agreement of sale of a donkey, (made) by Herakleides to Hatres. [- - -];Agreement of sale of a donkey, (made) by Sekonopis to Pakemis [- - -]; 18 obols.
